title: 1907 World Series Postcard Tigers vs Cubs
author: sporteq

posts.post_title: 1907 World Series Postcard Tigers vs Cubs
posts.post_content:
Amusing postcard from right after the 1907 World Series sweep by the Chicago Cubs over the Detroit Tigers featuring a beat up tiger in a coffin with the words "From the Cubs with regrets". At top is printed "Died October- "07 Clubbed to Death Too Bad". VG condition postcard has been used with a postmark date of 1909. Age toning thru out. Some minor creasing. Looks much better in person! 

Sorry about the bad scan :(

$300 Lower States.. FREE SHIPPING.. paypal FF
